thread.title: Shocker: Denver broke another temperature record
thread.title_full: Shocker: Denver broke another temperature record

author: Danika Worthington
title: Shocker: Denver broke another temperature record
text: Fire danger rises along Colorado’s Front Range February 21, 2017, 12:02 am Several wildfires broke out in northeastern Colorado Monday and unseasonably warm, windy weather could spark an additional round of fires Tuesday. Colorado Springs’ January wind storm wasn’t the most destructive, but it is among the deadliest February 20, 2017, 5:25 pm Despite downed trees, widespread power outages and wind-torn property across Colorado Springs, January’s freak wind storm didn’t make the list of the city’s most costly or destructive disasters, but it is among the deadliest. Evacuations ordered amid heavy Northern California rain February 21, 2017, 12:20 am SAN FRANCISCO (AP) — Evacuations were ordered in Northern California on Monday and flash-flood warnings were issued elsewhere as downpours swelled creeks and rivers to potentially dangerous levels in the already soggy region. Sunshine on Presidents Day in Denver, snow by Thursday February 20, 2017, 7:18 am It will be a sunny day in the Denver metro area Monday, with the high temperature well above normal.
